page.title: 01 GAZETTEER
page.content: At the centre of our area is the village of Exning,which lies two miles north west of Newmarket.There is now very little open space between Newmarket and Exning. The village has a small rivulet running through the centre,which starts as the springs south-west of the village.The work around this area is mainly farming,light industries and stud work.Studlands Park and Scaltback are new housing estates in the area. Part of Studlands Park was built for Americans from the local air force base at Mildenhall.The area contains 5 schools, 2 Primary schools,2 Middle schools and an Upper school. The Newmarket by-pass,A45 cuts across the area.
